Layer.StepP1UpPressMessageCommand: %function(self) gnSelectedRow = gnSelectedRow + 1 if gnSelectedRow == gnTotalRows then self:queuecommand('ExitRowSelected') elseif gnSelectedRow > gnTotalRows then gnSelectedRow = 0 self:queuecommand('ExitRowDeselected') end end
Layer.StepP1DownPressMessageCommand: %function(self) gnSelectedRow = gnSelectedRow + 1 if gnSelectedRow == gnTotalRows then self:queuecommand('ExitRowSelected') elseif gnSelectedRow > gnTotalRows then gnSelectedRow = 0 self:queuecommand('ExitRowDeselected') end end
